title: Meta launches Instagram Threads in a direct challenge to Twitter
description: Meta is pitching Threads as Instagram's "text-based conversation app."

title: JetBlue says it will end American Airlines partnership after losing DOJ antitrust case, will focus on Spirit
description: A federal judge ordered JetBlue and American to undo their partnership in the Northeast, ruling it violated antitrust law.

title: Bill Ackman explains why he embraced RFK Jr.'s skepticism on Covid vaccines
description: Bill Ackman once criticized Covid vaccination efforts for not moving fast enough. Now he's echoing Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s scientifically dubious skepticism.

title: Fed sees more rate hikes ahead, but at a slower pace, meeting minutes show
description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday released the minutes from its June 13-14 meeting.

title: ChatGPT app downloads are slowing down, BofA finds
description: Analysts found that app downloads for ChatGPT and Microsoft Bing have slowed in recent weeks, citing Sensor Tower data.

title: These are the 10 highest-paid CEOs in the U.S.—some pull in over $200 million a year
description: Chief executives at Pinterest, Peloton and Hertz are out-earning Apple’s Tim Cook, according to a new analysis published by the Wall Street Journal.

title: Authors sue OpenAI, allege ChatGPT was trained on their books without consent
description: Two authors filed a lawsuit against OpenAI alleging that their copyrighted books were used to train ChatGPT without their consent.

title: GM second-quarter sales increase 18.8% as supply chain stabilizes
description: Auto industry forecasters project industry sales to have increased 16% to 18% during the second quarter compared to a year earlier.

title: Chinese state media rebuke Mark Zuckerberg over reported plan to sell Quest headsets
description: The criticism comes after a report that Meta was exploring selling Quest headsets in China, despite Zuckerberg's past criticism of Chinese industrial espionage.

title: Aramco chief blames recessionary signals for low oil price, says 'optimistic' about future of demand
description: Saudi giant Aramco's chief executive has attributed the ongoing depression of oil prices to recessionary fears and economic headwinds.

title: Moderna strikes deal to develop mRNA drugs in China
description: The deal is the biotech company's first agreement with China after the Asian nation repeatedly refused to accept mRNA vaccines from U.S.-based manufacturers.

title: World registers hottest day since records began — with fresh highs expected in the coming weeks
description: Scientists warned the temperature record was likely to be the first of many, citing the combination of the climate crisis and the El Niño phenomenon.

title: Saudi energy minister says latest Riyadh-Moscow oil cuts showed unity with Russia
description: "We will do whatever is necessary. Not whatever it takes, whatever is necessary," the Saudi energy minister said of OPEC+ support of the market.

title: China unexpectedly cancels top EU diplomat's Beijing visit
description: An EU foreign affairs spokesperson confirmed to CNBC that Borrell's team had been told by their Chinese counterparts the new dates of July 10-11 were no longer possible.

title: Turkey's inflation rate cools despite steep lira plunge
description: Last October saw Turkey's inflation rate soar to 85%. The Turkish lira was last trading at 26.09 against the dollar.

title: Australia and Indonesia have signed a 'win-win' EV battery deal, analyst says
description: The two countries welcomed "new commercial deals between Australian and Indonesian business across the health, mining and digital economy sectors."

title: As the world gets hotter, millions of workers face up to the challenge of heat stress and productivity losses
description: CNBC's Sustainable Future takes a look at how rising temperatures could affect the world of work.

title: K-pop stocks dip briefly on report of antitrust probe on production
description: Shares of SM Entertainment and Hybe are still lower, but YG Entertainment is up over 2%

title: $19 billion in trade stranded on water as Canada's West Coast labor negotiations hit pause
description: Canada's western ports have not serviced any vessels since June 30. This is creating a backlog in trade with a total of 29 ports at a standstill.

title: ‘Be prepared for the worst’: Here are 4 tips on surviving long job interviews — and how to ace them
description: "If you have the frame of mind that interviewing is going to be a marathon, you'll expect it and you'll be better prepared to see things through until the end," said one expert.
